system.requirements:
Tier 2; None
Aptitudes: Willpower, Defence, Nurgle
system.effect:
Character can Reroll failed Willpower Tests to avoid or recover from Pinning. They also gain +10 to Willpower Tests to resist the effects of enemy intimidation effects.
In a Social Conflict, if the character's opponent's uses Intimidate, the character gains +20 to the Opposed Test.
